Articles.Content:
With connected living space and the new crew transfer options, it would be great if for example, when you get into a hatch, and the module is full, you'd pass direct to the next available space in a module.

For example you're on EVA, and you try to get in habitat module, but it only has two crew space, and it's full, you would still be allowed in and immediately transferred to the closest module with available crew space!
